column4: can someone help me with configuring my internet connection and installing the drivers?
can someone help me with configuring my internet connection and installing the drivers?
krine11: close em?
u guys keep complaining about helping krine11, can i get some help instead? ive been at this for many hours

ljl: ok well im trying to get on my wireless WPA2 network, and when i click on the internet icon at the top, there are no listed networks, this makes me think that i don't have the drivers installed that i need. So i need help first finding the right linux drivers, and then installing them, and ive heard WPA2 is harder to get working, so ill need help when it comes to that.
ljl: no wireless extensions on all three
ljl: my question is, how does noone know how to do this, isnt it rather basic??
ljl: don't know, i can tell you my computer model and you could prolly find out, but i dont know how to check
ljl: really im wondering is my card unsupported, or am i just doing something wrong...
ljl: how to check?
What is your card name?
run lspci if that'll help
so run lspci and look for something like it
Look for Atheros, i bet you have atheros
The reason I think he has Atheros is because ubuntu doesn't work it :(
my computer is a little less than a year old
You can read the description https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-restricted-modules-2.6.24/+bug/182489
(But following the directions from that bug page is Not easy!)
jaunty is the next version of ubuntu, coming out this month
o ok, well ill update it when it comes to that... i dont fell like going through the process again
maybe getting jaunty would fix your trouble, you can get it now... but maybe it cause you other trouble.
